content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I Googled APIs and SDKs for controlling game actions in League of Legends, finding links to Steam, Elgato, Logitech, CometChat, Nvidia, Microsoft Azure, and Riot Games documentation. I then browsed the Riot Games API website to learn how to authenticate with it. Recently, I was commanded to browse two specific pages on the Riot Games website to learn how to obtain an API key and create a new application on their developer portal. However, when I tried to browse the website, I received an error message saying I was not allowed to generate embeddings from the model.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://developer.riotgames.com/docs/lol", "question": "How to authenticate with the Riot Games API?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Error: You are not allowed to generate embeddings from this model', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://developer.riotgames.com/docs/lol", "question": "How to obtain an API key for the Riot Games API?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Error: You are not allowed to generate embeddings from this model', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://developer.riotgames.com/docs/getting-started", "question": "How to create a new application on the Riot Games developer portal?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Error: You are not allowed to generate embeddings from this model', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://developer.riotgames.com/docs/getting-started", "question": "How to obtain an API key for the Riot Games API?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Error: You are not allowed to generate embeddings from this model', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "riot_games_api.txt", "text": "To obtain an API key for the Riot Games API, we need to create a developer account and application on the Riot Games developer portal, and obtain an API key for the application."}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
